meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being an amateur.
meanings.sent1: Her numerous amateurisms in painting showed her lack of professional skill.
meanings.sent2: The amateurisms in his cooking were evident in the burnt toast.
meanings.sent3: Despite his amateurisms in gardening, he always had a smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: The amateurisms in her dance moves made her performance unique.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the amateurisms of young artists, each piece telling a different story.

meanings.definition: Actions, beliefs, or practices typical of an amateur.
meanings.sent1: His amateurisms in photography were evident in the blurry pictures.
meanings.sent2: She displayed amateurisms in her approach to playing the piano.
meanings.sent3: The amateurisms in his fishing technique always made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her amateurisms in public speaking made her endearing to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The amateurisms in his writing style gave his stories a raw authenticity.

meanings.definition: The state of engaging in activities without professional training or expertise.
meanings.sent1: Their amateurisms in carpentry often led to crooked shelves.
meanings.sent2: The team's amateurisms in soccer were evident in their lack of coordination.
meanings.sent3: Despite their amateurisms in cooking, they always enjoyed experimenting in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The amateurisms in her singing voice added a charming innocence to her performance.
meanings.sent5: The workshop was filled with the amateurisms of beginners eager to learn woodworking skills.
